verses.verse: The <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H5166>Nehemiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2446>Hachaliah.<s%> And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass in the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H3691>Chisleu,<s%> in the <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> as I was in <S%H7800>Shushan<s%> the <S%H1002>palace,<s%>

That <S%H2607>Hanani,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of my <S%H251>brothers,<s%> <S%H935>came,<s%> he and certain <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah;<s%> and I <S%H7592>asked<s%> them <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> that had <S%H6413>escaped,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were <S%H7604>left<s%> of the <S%H7628>captivity,<s%> and <S%H5921>concerning<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

And they <S%H559>said<s%> to me, The <S%H7604>remnant<s%> that are <S%H7604>left<s%> of the <S%H7628>captivity<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> in the <S%H4082>province<s%> are in <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7451>affliction<s%> and <S%H2781>reproach:<s%> the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> also is <S%H6555>broken<s%> down, and the <S%H8179>gates<s%> thereof are <S%H3341>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, when I <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words,<s%> that I <S%H3427>sat<s%> down and <S%H1058>wept,<s%> and <S%H56>mourned<s%> certain <S%H3117>days,<s%> and <S%H6684>fasted,<s%> and <S%H6419>prayed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%>

And <S%H559>said,<s%> I <S%H577>beseech<s%> you, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> the <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H3372>terrible<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> that <S%H8104>keeps<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and <S%H2617>mercy<s%> for them that <S%H157>love<s%> him and <S%H8104>observe<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments:<s%>

Let your <S%H241>ear<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> be <S%H7183>attentive,<s%> and your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H6605>open,<s%> that you may <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> of your <S%H5650>servant,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6419>pray<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you <S%H3117>now,<s%> <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night,<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and <S%H3034>confess<s%> the <S%H2403>sins<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> we have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against you: both I and my <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> have <S%H2398>sinned.<s%>

We have dealt very <S%H2254>corruptly<s%> against you, and have not <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> nor the <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> nor the <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H6680>commanded<s%> your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

<S%H2142>Remember,<s%> I <S%H4994>beseech<s%> you, the <S%H1697>word<s%> that you <S%H6680>commanded<s%> your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> If you <S%H4603>transgress,<s%> I will <S%H6327>scatter<s%> you <S%H6327>abroad<s%> among the <S%H5971>nations:<s%>

But if you <S%H7725>turn<s%> to me, and <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> them; <S%H518>though<s%> there were of you <S%H5080>cast<s%> out to the <S%H7097>uttermost<s%> part of the <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> yet will I <S%H6908>gather<s%> them from <S%H8033>there,<s%> and will <S%H935>bring<s%> them to the <S%H4725>place<s%> that I have <S%H970>chosen<s%> to <S%H7931>set<s%> my <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

Now <S%H1992>these<s%> are your <S%H5650>servants<s%> and your <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> you have <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> by your <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3581>power,<s%> and by your <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

O <S%H136>LORD,<s%> I <S%H577>beseech<s%> you, let <S%H4994>now<s%> your <S%H241>ear<s%> be <S%H7183>attentive<s%> to the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> of your <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and to the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> of your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> who <S%H2655>desire<s%> to <S%H3372>fear<s%> your <S%H8034>name:<s%> and <S%H6743>prosper,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, your <S%H5650>servant<s%> this <S%H3117>day,<s%> and <S%H5414>grant<s%> him <S%H7356>mercy<s%> in the <S%H6440>sight<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H376>man.<s%> For I was the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H4945>cupbearer.<s%>
